data.tweet: See the numbers behind Arsenals victory over Liverpool

origin.sentence: This season, Liverpool have averaged 1.8 non-penalty expected goals per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Arsenal completed four key passes in this match, considerably less than their season average of 12 key passes per 90 minutes.
Arsenal carried the ball into the opponent's box nine times, while Liverpool did so four times.

Arsenal applied pressure high up the pitch, pressing 41 times in the final third while Liverpool pressed 20 times in their attacking third. Arsenal made two tackles in the final third while Liverpool didn't make any final third tackles.
sentences: Arsenal carried the ball into the opponent's box nine times.
Liverpool pressed their opponent four times in the final third.
Arsenal pressed the opponent 41 times in their final third to make the game more difficult.
Liverpool attempted to make 20 challenges in the last third.
This season, Liverpool have averaged 2.0 attempted challenges in final third per 90 minutes.
Arsenal won two tackles in the attacking third.
Premier League teams attempted 2.5 challenges in this final third this season.

data.tweet: Martinelli, our man of the match, got one goal and carried the ball into the opponent's box four times - more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Martinelli was our man of the match.
Martinelli managed to score in one successful game.Martinelli carried the ball into the opponent's box more times than any other player on the pitch.

origin.sentence: Martinelli was our man of the match.
Martinelli carried the ball into the opponent's box more times than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: This season, Martinelli has the third-most carries into the opposition box (17) behind Salah in second (18), while teammate Bukayo Saka has the most (19).
Martinelli also pressed the opponent nine times in the final third and successfully received 10 progressive passes - both more than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Martinelli pressed their opponent nine times in the final third.
Martinelli pressed the opponent more times than any other player on the pitch.

origin.sentence: Martinelli pressed the opponent nine times in the final third.
Martinelli pressed the opponent more times in the final third than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Martinelli has successfully received second-most progressive passes in the Premier League this season (74), behind teammate Gabriel Jesus (88).
Thomas Partey attempted 45 passes, completing 93% of them - the highest pass-completion rate of any player on the pitch.
sentences: 93% of Thomas Partey's passes found a teammate.Thomas Partey had the highest passing accuracy of any player on the pitch.

origin.sentence: Thomas Partey had the highest passing accuracy of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Thomas Partey played eight successful long balls with a long-ball-completion rate of 89%.

89% of Thomas Partey's passes found a teammate.

93% of Thomas Partey's passes found a teammate.

data.tweet: Thomas Partey and Ben White both pressed the opponent 20 times, while eight of Partey's presses won possession for his side- more than any other player on the pitch.
Thomas Partey and Kostas Tsimikas made three successful tackles (joint-most of any player on the pitch), while Bukayo Saka made two successful tackles.
William Saliba and Thomas Partey made three interceptions - joint most of any player on the pitch.
